reviewText: "Play back feature may not be available on this disk"  Is this one of those European versions limited to regions? I am stuck with two copies.
All DVDs of this collection have dull sound of narration. No subtitles

The Scorched Earth series is excellent. If you are a World War 2 buff you will be more than pleased by any of the titles. I currently own 5 and will continue to buy them all. The only series that I would rate higher would be The World at War.
